ygData.subject: Re: New Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: What I d like to see is a bi-monthly rotation of items.  Have you noticed how common Shiny Brass Sheilds (AC+10, SV+ 10) are nowadays? I d like the trainer to
ygData.messageBody:
What I'd like to see is a bi-monthly rotation of items. Have you
noticed how common Shiny Brass Sheilds (AC+10, SV+ 10) are nowadays?
I'd like the trainer to "go away" JUST for 2 months, and have him
replaced with a goblin or kobold NPC carrying a Cleric's shield (with
stats such as AC+9, WIS+3, STR+3). This would increase the variety of
items in the game, but not the number as such, AND make the Shiny Brass
Shield more valuable!

I know that this will reflect the Screaming Mace Quest, so this would
have to go hand in hand with a new Cleric quest weapon. How about the
Knight Star (a quest Morning Star). That sounds cool. A weapon that
casts a low level heal on the user each round would be nice!

Baelstorm

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Allsar [SMTP:bogey@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 7:05 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
>
> From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>
> I agree that we need some good quest item. It doesn't have to be some
> awsome 1hb that does 15 dmg with 40 delay or something like that.
> Somehting
> like a 2hb with charges of mana regen, or like what Lohre said, +7 wis
> would
> be really ncie also. Have like 12 dmg delay 36 with +7 wisdom, cleric
> only
> and i'd be really happy.
> Allsar Olath`Vlos - 25th level - Rathe
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Schlagenhauf <trelane@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, July 08, 1999 4:26 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
>
>
> >From: "Mike Schlagenhauf" <trelane@...>
> >
> ><devil's advocate>
> >True, but how much of a tank/solo class is a cleric compared to a
> paladin?
> >And if there were to be a cleric super-weapon, would it be 1h or 2h?
> I
> know
> >personally I'd want 1h mace or hammer, but there are plenty of people
> who'd
> >want a nice 2h staff.
> ></devil's advocate>
> >
> >That aside, I agree, I've not found much in the way of a 1h blunt
> weapon
> >that does more than 9 dmg, and certainly none that have those sort of
> side
> >benefits. I know I'd love to have a weapon that alone just added
> another 7
> >wis to my character. I've just read on EQ'Lizer that "two or three"
> >paladins already have them, and they're about lv 18. That screams to
> me
> >that either the game balance is about to be completely upended by a
> single
> >weapon (just my opinion from seeing the same sort of weapon
> implementation
> >on MUDs that I played), or that they're going to get something even
> better
> >that takes a higher level to accomplish the quest. All in all, I
> agree,
> I'd
> >like to see some more powerful 1h blunt, something with more than
> 9dmg
> >(maybe there is something like that, I just haven't heard about it
> yet).
> >--
> >Mike Schlagenhauf
> >trelane@...
> >Lohre
> >Ambassador of <Lifeforce Brigade>
> >Bristlebane Server
> >
